structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ACQUISITION OF WATERWORKS BY CITIES AND WATER DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Agreement as to purchase price of waterworks.
law.text: The water district commissioners of water districts or the legislative body of any of the aforesaid cities may agree with the owner or owners as to the value of said waterworks and purchase it at such value.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 4, effective June 17, 1954.
